"The First Farewell":
"The rampaging dragon Hadred targets
Darkers. Even in the throes of madness,
this remains so. And it has been the key
to tracking his movements. Ever since
the return of Dark Falz Elder, powerful
Darker attacks continue unabated. And
when Quna judges that Hadred shall
appear, it emerges with a heroic
determination in its heart.
Fracaso: Retirarse despues de ser incapacitado"
